Name: Custom Chat Box
Text: Custom Chat Box 3 (3s)

Name: α
Text: Are these... the Corrupted?

Name: α
Text: If I follow the traces left by these "creatures"...

Name: α
Text: There's no stopping them...!

Name: α
Text: It's finally over.
You are...?!

Name: α
Text: Huh? What's that over there...?

Name: α
Text: Where are they going...?

Name: Luna
Text: You filthy insects!

Name: α
Text: Time to go home

Name: Luna
Text: Has the Punishing Virus... calmed down somehow?

Name: Luna
Text: Must I destroy all the nodes ahead to get out of this passage?

Name: Stage Designer
Text: Sorry, the performance here is not ready yet. It will have the same format as the previous one though.

Name: Luna
Text: The power of the Red Tide has infiltrated this place... Someone has already made a "deal."

Name: Luna
Text: Behind this...

Name: [■■■■α]
Text: Time to go home and wash your clothes, Luna.

Name: Luna
Text: Stay focused.

Name: Luna
Text: I can't stop yet.
Skip the stage and start the final battle directly?
Select Difficulty
Skip battle?

Name: Luna
Text: Just finish this off.

Name: Luna
Text: ...Hah.

Name: Luna
Text: Data... cannot flow normally here.

Name: Luna
Text: Is the key hidden over there...?

Name: Luna
Text: The key to breaking the shackles lies within.

Name: Luna
Text: But this energy...

Name: Luna
Text: While I can break in directly...

Name: Luna
Text: Based on the energy flow, if I disable the nodes one by one,

Name: Luna
Text: The risk will be much lower...

Name: Luna
Text: One last try.

Name: Luna
Text: Should have done it earlier.

Name: Luna
Text: As I thought, the energy level inside has diminished slightly.

Name: Luna
Text: Incests... They just keep coming.

Name: Luna
Text: This passage... leads directly to the last node.

Name: Luna
Text: ...A shortcut created by the data collisions?

Name: Luna
Text: Stay focused.

Name: Luna
Text: I can't stop yet.

Name: Luna
Text: The Red Tide is coming in.

Name: Selene
Text: Trust, then be disappointed... Why are you still walking down this path?

Name: Selene
Text: Turn back now. You will only find more lies and pain lying ahead.

Name: Selene
Text: Have you forgotten? Every time you tried to reach out, only to get betrayed again.

Name: [■■■■α]
Text: Go home, Luna.

Name: Luna
Text: Your tricks are truly clumsy.

Name: Luna
Text: Get lost.

Name: Luna
Text: It's about to begin.
All the remaining portals are activated...
Reset the puzzle?
The door is unlocked...
Where are you?
Found you.
Don't even think about getting away.
Hehehehe...
Gotcha!

Name: Wanshi
Text: Understood, let's go.

Name: Greg & Sandy
Text: Copy that.

Name: Greg
Text: Toys, books, everything's a mess... and Babylonia Construct remains... What happened here?

Name: Wanshi
Text: Stay alert. There's still quite a bit of Punishing Virus left here.

Name: Sandy
Text: The Ascendant used this place as their base, after all...

Name: Wanshi
Text: No... It's not just the Ascendant.

Name: Wanshi
Text: There are still some Corrupted remaining... Have to make it quick.

Name: Sandy
Text: A high concentration of the Punishing Virus is detected over there as well. I'll go check it out with Greg.

Name: Wanshi
Text: All the information here can be captured by Hawkeye.

Name: Researcher A
Text: Run!

Name: Researcher B
Text: How is it possible for the Punishing Virus to be inside here?!

Name: Researcher A
Text: They say that lab got wrecked! All the Punishing Virus has leaked out!

Name: Wanshi
Text: These traces are old... left from clashes between humans and the Corrupted.

Name: Wanshi
Text: Is this why the institute was wiped out?

Name: Wanshi
Text: ...All the specimen tanks were shattered. Biological experiments, maybe?

Name: Sandy
Text: Oh!

Name: Greg
Text: Sandy?! Ugh-ahh!

Name: Wanshi
Text: Hello? Greg? Sandy?

Name: Wanshi
Text: Commandant, something happened on their end. I can't reach them.

Name: Wanshi
Text: Hold on... There's more information here.

Name: Wanshi
Text: Let me try to analyze it with Hawkeye.

Name: Wanshi
Text: Are these... test subjects?

Name: Wanshi
Text: They were actually... using children as specimens.

Name: Wanshi
Text: ...Something's off, Commandant. Greg and Sandy may have found something.

Name: Wanshi
Text: Don't go there yet. Come to me first. We've got a situation here.

Name: Wanshi
Text: It's not over yet.

Name: Wanshi
Text: Now's not the time to sleep.

Name: Wanshi
Text: Looks like some children's doodles.

Name: Wanshi
Text: An oil pastel? There's a... metal spike hidden inside?

Name: Wanshi
Text: Children's toys...

Name: Wanshi
Text: The kids here... Were they all turned into Constructs?
Would you like to familiarize the moves of the new frame?
Let's take a look with Hawkeye.
Looks like it won't open...

Name: Rosetta
Text: Perhaps you've noticed that the Punishing Virus concentration is higher in the hall than above. Let's move through quickly.

Name: Wanshi
Text: There are also Hetero-Creatures here? I've never seen that form before.

Name: Wanshi
Text: Watch out, they are all hiding in the shadows!

Name: Wanshi
Text: Ugh... My M.I.N.D... isn't fully stabilized yet.

Name: Wanshi
Text: Uh... I feel much better now. Don't worry.

Name: Wanshi
Text: Commandant, hold off on going there for now. It's not safe inside.

Name: Rosetta
Text: That wasn't so bad. Let's keep looking for more leads.

Name: Wanshi
Text: Stay alert. There's something suspicious about that door at the end of the hall.

Name: Wanshi
Text: We should go check it out first. I can see a large space behind that door.

Name: Rosetta
Text: Sure, let's go.

Name: Wanshi
Text: No, can't open it. It requires an access card.

Name: Rosetta
Text: Just blast it open, then.

Name: Wanshi
Text: Are you here for a speedrun or to look for clues?

Name: Rosetta
Text: ...Let's go find an access card.

Name: Wanshi
Text: There might still be Hetero-Creatures around there. Let's search this area first.

Name: Wanshi
Text: I'll go look around the back.

Name: Wanshi
Text: Then let's split up. I'll check the other side.

Name: Wanshi
Text: And Commandant?

Name: Wanshi
Text: I'll check out the fork behind the door. Stay in touch.

Name: Wanshi
Text: That toy... I should go take a look.

Name: Wanshi
Text: I'm detecting quite a lot of information from the toy... I'll try using Hawkeye.

Name: Rosetta
Text: Nothing unusual over here. What about you?

Name: Wanshi
Text: I've got the access card and some details about the experiments on children.

Name: Rosetta
Text: Experiments on children... Copy that. Let's regroup at the door and try opening it.

Name: Wanshi
Text: Aight.

Name: Wanshi
Text: Huff—this is neverending...

Name: Rosetta
Text: Don't linger here! Hand me the access card. Let's get through the door!

Name: Wanshi
Text: Leave the enemies to me. Quick!

Name: Rosetta
Text: The door's open! But something seems to be blocking it from behind...

Name: Wanshi
Text: Now, just give it a push!

Name: Rosetta
Text: Roger. Commandant, come inside!

Name: Wanshi
Text: Let's go!
Tap Basic Attack repeatedly.
Ping Orbs or hold the Red Orb to build up the skill gauge. Once it's full, hold the Red Orb to enter Calibration Mode.
In Calibration Mode, repeatedly tap the Red Orb or hold Basic Attack to fire bullets!
After emptying the Cylinder, tap the Red Orb to throw your empty gun.
Tap the Red Orb or move to where the gun landed to retrieve it and refill the Cylinder.
Use your Signature Move!
Seems it hasn't been activated yet...
A lusterless teddy bear... next to a small, mangled body.
Childhood innocence and dreams, abandoned and scattered.
Perhaps when every tear is shed and every drop of blood is drained, the pain will end.
These branches, sprouting out of nowhere, appear to be entirely formed from Punishing.

Name: Wanshi
Text: Let's head back and check that door again.

Name: Huaxu
Text: Yup, but... Surge, engage!

Name: Commandant
Text: Let's meet up at their location. I'm afraid this mission is way more challenging than expected.

Name: Commandant
Text: We can't afford to lose any manpower at this point.

Name: Luna
Text: These traces are fresh...
This must be the legendary Project Winter... how intriguing.
Thinking organs? A physiological consciousness transfer? Heh. That's the pipe dream of a senile old fool.

Name: Lilith
Text: Too bad, today's not your day to meet your maker. After all, that gentleman has high hopes for you.

Name: Madam Monzano (?)
Text: That ship was never going to keep everyone alive.

Name: Madam Monzano (?)
Text: Only my colony ship can usher in a new golden age!

Name: Lilith
Text: Living in the past... ha, a tempting notion.

Name: Lilith
Text: But what's the difference between that and being a fossil?

Name: Vonnegut
Text: The new you is the culmination of every choice you've made. Don't let hesitation stifle your ambition, Lilith.

Name: Madam Monzano (?)
Text: Heh. Did I forget to mention? Discord was always an expendable pawn... and the deal's done.

Name: Madam Monzano (?)
Text: And the deal is already done.

Name: Lilith
Text: There are many things you could call pawns... but my beloved dolls are off-limits!

Name: Madam Monzano
Text: Approaching the airspace of the North Asian Research Institute of Life Science and Evolution.

Name: Madam Monzano
Text: Altitude 30000 feet. Cloud cover and visibility good, initiating cabin depressurization...

Name: Madam Monzano
Text: Eleanor, confirm our objectives.

Name: Lilith
Text: Assassinate Godwin, and gather as much intel as possible on "Project Winter".

Name: Lilith
Text: Outer perimeter patrols neutralized, resistance encountered as anticipated.

Name: Madam Monzano
Text: Heh. Good, your training paid off. Godwin should be deep within the facility, stay sharp.

Name: Godwin
Text: Looks like a little pest has crawled in here. I'm warning you, the decontamination systems aren't forgiving.

Name: Lilith
Text: Huh? You call those rust buckets that can barely lift an arm "decontamination systems"?

Name: Lucia
Text: The cries for help are coming from up ahead. Let's go, Commandant.

Name: Lucia
Text: The family turf war is raging up ahead. If we want to reach the factory, we'll have to push through it.

Name: Lucia
Text: The fighting is only getting worse... Looks like this is the main front.

Name: Lucia
Text: I can hear hostages calling for help in the distance. Commandant, let's keep moving.

Name: Lucia
Text: Breaking through!

Name: Lucia
Text: Commandant, the combat zone is tight and the fire is heavy. Please be careful.

Name: Lucia
Text: All hostages inside are safe. Time to fall back, Commandant.

Name: Lucia
Text: Combat initiated. Awaiting your orders, Commandant.

Name: Lucia
Text: The hall's secure for now. Are you alright, Commandant?

Name: Russell
Text: Heh heh heh... The Savoys sure are powerful.

Name: Russell
Text: But unfortunately, the legend of "Lady Dawne"...

Name: Lucia
Text: ...Enemy reinforcements incoming. Get ready, Commandant.

Name: Olivia
Text: We're running out of time! We have to end this battle quickly!

Name: Olivia
Text: The wedding must be completed before the stroke of twelve!

Name: Olivia
Text: If this tradition is violated...

Name: Lucia
Text: The enemy has deployed heavy weapons and launched an attack... Commandant, please retreat for now. I'll hold them off out here!

Name: Lucia
Text: ...Got it. Let's stand together and put up a good fight, then!

Name: Lucia
Text: The final wave is closing in! Commandant, stay close to me and ready yourself for one last fight!

Name: Olivia
Text: This is an iron law of Catania, unchanged for a thousand years!

Name: Olivia
Text: The Savoys would lose all the respect people have for them.

Name: Olivia
Text: And dissolving the Thirteen Families would become unthinkable!

Name: Russell
Text: It's all coming to an end today!

Name: Vera
Text: This frame... hah, I never thought I'd find its power unfamiliar.

Name: Vera
Text: These "embryos" are still alive?

Name: Vera
Text: This door won't open. Let's keep moving forward.

Name: Vera
Text: There is a high level of Punishing concentration nearby. The "Hollow" should be inside.

Name: Vera
Text: Let's go. Stay close to me.

Name: Vera
Text: This looks like a lab?

Name: Vera
Text: Looks like we're on the right track. We're getting closer to the "Hollow."

Name: Vera
Text: A lab recorder? Can we find any valuable information from it?

Name: Vera
Text: Hah, I bet this person never imagined the recorder would document their own demise.

Name: Vera
Text: These are Haynes's notes... that old bastard is everywhere.

Name: Vera
Text: I can smell the stench of his self-pity and arrogance from here. Is there anything else?

Name: Vera
Text: Let's stop reading. Knowing Haynes, he's definitely waiting for us at the end. Let's go.

Name: Vera
Text: Is this device still operational? What's it used for?

Name: Vera
Text: Wait, it seems to be channeling energy into the "Hollow." Stand back, let me destroy it.

Name: Vera
Text: Hmph... Just as I thought, something's wrong.

Name: Vera
Text: There's still time...! I'm not done yet!

Name: Vera
Text: Hahahaha... Am I repeating the same mistakes again?!

Name: Vera
Text: Shh, I hear something. Let's go check it out.

Name: Vera
Text: Ugh... We've finally reached the "Hollow". Now then... who wants to die?

Name: Vera
Text: Do you think... I'm going to just fall and do nothing?!

Name: Vera
Text: How disgusting! Get lost!

Name: Vera
Text: It can't be destroyed... Something's protecting it. Seems like it's something important.

Name: Vera
Text: Hmm? Did the power come back on? And did that door just open too?
[Insert cutscene here - animation with synchronized character actions]
[Insert action sequence]
[Insert special effects]

Name: Vera
Text: Well then, come with me.

Name: Vera
Text: The shadows will devour everything. This is my last warning for you to leave.

Name: Vera
Text: The ballroom here has never been opened before.

Name: Vera
Text: The key to enter the ballroom has long since been devoured.

Name: Vera
Text: Let's find it first.

Name: Vera
Text: Beyond the mirror lies a deeper unknown. Do you have the courage to step through and see? Perhaps... what you desire awaits there.

Name: Vera
Text: Oh? You're still as curious as ever.

Name: Vera
Text: Still want to pry into more secrets?

Name: Vera
Text: Disobedient one, beware of punishment.

Name: Vera
Text: There, this is your "invitation" to the ball.

Name: Vera
Text: Join me, and follow the rhythm of the dance.

Name: Vera
Text: What's this? You dare ignore my invitation?

Name: Vera
Text: ...Is this also something your conviction can achieve?

Name: Vera
Text: ...I'm beginning to forget what this castle once looked like.

Name: Vera
Text: Walk with me... it's been too many years.

Name: Vera
Text: Heh, the "Rose's Curse"... I find myself missing it, strangely enough.

Name: Vera
Text: If the story returns to the [Good Ending], I'll invite you to dance with me again.

Name: Vera
Text: Our dance melody has reached its finale, as you said... let's go together.

Name: Vera
Text: I can sense the key's presence, it's close by.
Vera Affection Level 100, congratulations on completion!
<color=#e8f5ff>Lingering Silence</color>
Skip the stage and advance to the "Hollow" directly?

Name: Lee
Text: This is Lee of Gray Raven, on site at the target Dead Zone.

Name: Lee
Text: Enemy targets confirmed.

Name: Lee
Text: Proceeding with the mission.

Name: Lee
Text: Wait, that was...

Name: Lee
Text: ...It's a... "tower"?

Name: Lee
Text: Ugh... I don't recognize these fluctuations... Enemies... are gathering?

Name: Lee
Text: Dammit...

Name: Huaxu
Text: Partial module restoration complete, Computing Power units received.

Name: Huaxu
Text: Activating support program. Engaging cooperative battle protocols.

Name: Huaxu
Text: Engaging cooperative battle protocols.

Name: Huaxu
Text: Warning: Multiple modules under intense attack

Name: Huaxu
Text: Alert: Connection to multiple modules lost

Name: Huaxu
Text: Punishing signal detected

Name: Huaxu
Text: Huaxu... Establishing connection... Progress: 35.12%

Name: Huaxu
Text: Huaxu... Establishing connection... Progress: 63.45%

Name: Huaxu
Text: Huaxu... Reconnecting... Connection successful

Name: Huaxu
Text: Warning: Huaxu subsystem under attack

Name: Huaxu
Text: High-intensity Punishing signal detected

Name: Lucia
Text: Commandant, I'm right here with you.

Name: Lee
Text: Don't worry, Commandant. Leave it to me.

Name: Liv
Text: Commandant, I'll do my best to help.

Name: Karenina
Text: Let me help!

Name: Ishmael
Text: I knew you would find your way here... "Falling from the heavens"... it is a fitting entrance for you.

Name: Ishmael
Text: One person alone can't handle this. Let's split up and regroup further ahead, alright?

Name: Ishmael
Text: The convergence is slowing down...

Name: Ishmael
Text: Gray Raven is still over there. I must... move faster.

Name: Ishmael
Text: ...Is it done? Hah... at last, it's over.

Name: Ishmael
Text: I've always known you were there, just behind me.
